extendedInfo.description: âââââ App Storeâs Best Game of 2012 ââââââââââ App Storeâs Best New Game of 2012 ââââââââââ App Storeâs iPhone App of the Week âââââChosen Apple Store's Best Game of 2012, Angry Words is an addictive word game that has already exceeded 8 million downloads. Challenge your friends and enjoy yourself by making words! You can play whenever you want and against whomever you want: It is an asynchronous, cross-platform, multi-player game. You can play against your friends or against random opponents. And there are unlimited simultaneous games!Combine the letters in your rack with the ones in the board, and use the bonus squares to get more points. You can double and even triple the value of the letters you use or the words you make! Besides, if you manage to use all the letters on the rack in one same move, Angry Words will reward you with 40 extra points.Angry Words has an intuitive and sophisticated interface, and has animations so you can revive your best moves.You can play in 12 different languages: Spanish, British English, American English, Catalan, French, German, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese and, now, also Basque!Start playing Angry Words on Facebook!If you like Angry Words, check out Word Crack!Already a fan of the game?Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/PlayAngryWordsFollow us on Twitter: @PlayAngryWordsThis version does not contain ads.

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: But won\'t update. Last time I had to uninstall then reinstall but all my games had gone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Would be nice if we could know the word meaning in game for free. Everything else is perfect;)
reviews.author: Sigita Ruleviciene

reviews.title: Enjoyable
reviews.comment: Still needs the addition of an option to challenge a word without paying for a dictionary check. Of course to have the option to challenge it may need to offer the option to turn off the autochecking words.
reviews.author: Roberto Maldonado

reviews.title: Bad communication
reviews.comment: Bought extra coins and didn\'t get them but they still have my money. I\'ve sent 5 messages but they just ignore me. They put it into my account after 2 days. Still no contact though
reviews.author: Keith Beckett

reviews.title: Many laguages
reviews.comment: It is great to be able to play games of different lenguages at the same time.
reviews.author: Armand Arc\303\251

reviews.title: Hmm. Entertaining. Painfully slow UI.
reviews.comment: Very slow UI. You sell a LOT OF GAMES. Why is it so hard to make a native, smooth game? Reloading is VERY slow. Makes me forget I have a quad-core phone. Also, icon and titles inside the app do NOT look very HD. Needs a lot of work...
reviews.author: Calot Ono

reviews.title: Intellectual Fun
reviews.comment: The reason I didn\'t give five stars is due to two issues. One being the problem of playing a word, only to use the same word later and get it bounced. Secondly, if someone \"times out\" or resigns, it shouldn\'t appear in My profile as a resignation. Other wise much love to the creators of this game. Also, in my opinion \"cheats\" shouldn\'t be allowed period.
reviews.author: Dawn Langer

reviews.title: Stuboyz
reviews.comment: I paid for this app and the new token thing is crap we should get the new features as part of the game...looks like ur just trying to milk us for all we\'re worth...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: I think this is a great game. Much better than words with friends or any similar \"scrabble\' games. For those complaining about the new \'coin\' based features - you don\'t have to pay for them, you can get plenty for free by simply winning games.
reviews.author: Dane Jones

reviews.title: Malos cambios
reviews.comment: No me gusta nada lo de las monedas y lo del diccionario,  tenia que haber una opci\303\263n para poder activarlo o desactivarlo como el sonido.  Como se vuelve a la versi\303\263n anterior ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Very stable on Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1 and Droid RAZR HD...
reviews.author: Kenneth Rossman

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Better than zynga\'s words with friends.
reviews.author: JD Bertron

reviews.title: Cheaters stay away!!
reviews.comment: If you are not intelligent enough to play the game without cheating... Just stay away, this game is awesome!! Please don\'t do that.
reviews.author: Edwin Rodriguez

reviews.title: Addicted to this game
reviews.comment: One of the best games I play.
reviews.author: Corinne Prince

reviews.title: Anuncios en versi\303\263n pagada??
reviews.comment: Hellooo. Pagu\303\251 para no ver m\303\241s anuncios, pero TODAVIA VEO ANUNCIOS!!! Lento a veces. Tienes q vincular tu cuenta a Facebook por obigaci\303\263n para q salga foto en profile. Cuando quitar\303\241n los anuncios d Twitter y Facebook?  Por lo dem\303\241s...TREMENDA APP!!!
reviews.author: Madeline Hern\303\241ndez

reviews.title: now fixed
reviews.comment: im now able to play, goid stuff
reviews.author: Darren Rogers
